text: Angelo Dundee (born Angelo Mirena; August 30, 1921February 1, 2012) was an American boxing trainer and cornerman. He was known for his work with Muhammad Ali (1960–1981). He also worked with 15 other world boxing champions, including Sugar Ray Leonard, José Nápoles, George Foreman, George Scott, Jimmy Ellis, Carmen Basilio, Luis Manuel Rodríguez, and Willie Pastrano. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Boxing coaches Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Angelo Dundee
